analysis.description:
BullTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/30460.sol#704-730) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(owner,beneficiary,tokens) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/30460.sol#726)

	- require(bool)(whitelist.isWhitelisted(beneficiary)) (/../data/reentrancy/solidity_contract/30460.sol#706)
